education.area: Tiger Media Learning Center Academy, Graphics

volunteer.summary: Mentoring high school students and aiding them in completing projects related to web development.
Organizing fundraisers such as bake sales to raise funds for a peer mentor camp in the Spring, as well as for social events and other activities within the club.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship is an automatic $2,000 scholarship per year for four years of undergraduate study for first-time degree seeking students. Students must have a 3.5 GPA, 1200 SAT or 23 ACT upon the time of application to UH Manoa.

awards.title: Summer Sessions Sophomore Merit Scholarship
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii at Mānoa Outreach College
awards.summary: The $1,200 award is to be applied towards the tuition for a single UH Mānoa Summer Sessions 2020 course. The student must have UH Mānoa as their home campus in the Fall 2019 and Spring 2020 semesters, have sophomore standing (30-59 credits) at the end of the Fall 2019 semester (UH Mānoa and Transfer Credits), have a cumulative GPA of 3.5 or higher as of the end of the Fall 2019 semester (a student’s cumulative GPA is based on credit courses completed at UH Mānoa), and be registered for at least 3 credits in the Summer 2020 term by March 27, 2020.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Undergraduate students are awarded the Dean’s List distinction if they earn a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade (C/NC courses do not count), and do not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester.
